game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure hidden by the ancient pirate, Blackbeard.
game.description: The legendary pirate, Blackbeard, is said to have hidden his vast treasure on a remote island. Many have searched for it, but none have been successful. Can you find the treasure and bring it back?
game.reward: A chest filled with gold and jewels.

task.description: Tortuga Island is the last known location where Blackbeard was seen.
The secret map is said to be hidden in a cave on Tortuga Island.

task.objective: Follow the map to the treasure.
task.description: The map will lead you to the treasure, but be careful. There are many dangers along the way.
